abstract: The ThinkStation D10 from Lenovo is a PC that is primarily intended for game designers, videographers and other high-end users.
snippet: The ThinkStation D10 from Lenovo is a PC that is primarily intended for game designers, videographers and other high-end users.
lead_paragraph: You can party on your ThinkPad, but you perform serious work on your ThinkStation D10 from Lenovo. It is a PC that is primarily intended for game designers, videographers and other high-end users, with powerful components and classy black styling.

headline.main: High-End Workstation Works Hard, Plays Hard
headline.print_headline: High-End Workstation Works Hard, Plays Hard
